Question
========
Which of the following is the definition of a normal good?

Answerlist
----------
* $\frac{\partial x^*_c}{\partial I} \geq 0$
* $\frac{\partial x^*}{\partial I} \geq 0$
* $\frac{\partial x^*}{\partial p_x} \geq 0$
* $\frac{\partial E^*}{\partial x} \geq 0$
* $\frac{\partial V^*}{\partial x} \geq 0$

Solution
================
Take the derivative of demand w.r.t income

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
* False
